title: The coast of pleasure; chapters practical, geographical and anecdotal on the social, open-air restaurant life of the French Riviera, with a few notes on the ways of approach to the resort of worldlings, by Grant Richards ... with a frontispiece in colour and other illustrations by Tom Van Oss.
author: Richards, Grant, 1872-1948.

title: Mémoires.
author: Société des Antiquaires du Centre, Bourges.
